bug.author: demirhere
bug.description:
The user with annotator privileges cannot sync git, however admin can. (It outputs an html error page). <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nmanovic>@nmanovic</denchmark-link> mentioned there might be a typo here (should be engine.task.change): <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/cvat/blob/5f0c26e82f38a40d33e8ffcc78247bc612f5b340/cvat/apps/git/views.py#L37>https://github.com/opencv/cvat/blob/5f0c26e82f38a40d33e8ffcc78247bc612f5b340/cvat/apps/git/views.py#L37</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11932702/54092696-6d30c900-434c-11e9-8951-861b21acfc0e.png></denchmark-link>
